title: Make logout button clearly visible with dark color styling

requirements.text: Update the logout button/link in the Header component and LoginButton component to use a dark color (e.g., dark text or dark background) so it is clearly visible against the navigation bar background. Ensure the styling is consistent across both desktop and mobile nav layouts.

quotes: logout is not properly visible change it to a dark colour

acceptanceCriteria: The logout button/link is rendered with a dark color that provides strong contrast against its background
The logout option is visually distinguishable and easy to locate in the navigation bar
Dark color styling is applied consistently on both desktop and mobile views
The logout button remains functional (triggers logout when clicked)

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts or frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts
Do not alter logout functionality â€” only change visual styling
nonGoals: Redesigning the entire header or navigation
